title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor', nothing happens and the current editor remains the same.
EB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor', a new editor should be opened for the file, even if it is already open, because the selected editor type is different.
SR:
Reproduce the issue by following these steps:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
3. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'.
4. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
5. Verify that a new editor for the file 'test.xml' is opened, replacing the current editor if any.

NOTES: The 'scripted resource editor example' is the default editor for XML files, but it ignores the XML file content. The expected behavior is to open a new editor that respects the actual file content.
